item.title: Project Wrap-Up Meeting
item.description: London, Thursday 27th June, 2019 iframe.map { display: block; width: 49%; float: left; } img[src*="#center"] { display: block; float: right; width: 49%; } p.clear { clear: both; } The meeting will be held at the London campus of Loughborough University, in room LDN 1.03. Agenda 10:00 - 10:20Arrival, Fruit and Coffee 10:20 - 10:30PI's welcome and project conclusionJeremy 10:30 - 11:00 PiStack presentation & DemoPhil / Steven 11:00 - 11:30JISC Moonshot demoStefan / Jeremy 11:30 - 12:00Discussion and feedbackPosco 12:00 - 13:00Lunch 13:00 - 13:30 Fruit-Cli presentation & DemoTony 13:30 - 14:00Real-world applications demoEiko / Phil / Tony 14:00 - 14:30 Coffee break 14:30 - 15:30 Project publication review and guests feedbackPosco 15:30 - 16:00Coffee break and guests leaving 16:00 - 17:00Next proposal 17:00 - xx:xxDinner and drink?
